name: JCross File
summary: Learn about .JCW files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The Hot Potatoes software consists of the JCross, JCloze, JQuiz, JMatch, JMix, and Masher utilities that can create different activities that can be shared on the web. The software was created by a group of programmers at the University of Victoria in Canada.
NOTE: In 2009, the development of the software ceased but it is still available to download and use for free.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
